snippet: Golden State missed its first six shots before Stephen Curry led a rout of the Knicks, who were powerless to prevent the Warriors’ 50th straight regular-season home victory.
lead_paragraph: Golden State missed its first six shots before Stephen Curry led a rout of the Knicks, who were powerless to prevent the Warriors’ 50th straight regular-season home victory.

headline.print_headline: Warriors Challenged by Knicks, but for Only a Few Minutes
headline.main: Warriors Challenged by Knicks, but for Only a Few Minutes
